body.p:
The cbft-bleve-dump utility allows you to print all the rows in the specified index. This is helpful for troubleshooting because the index or index fragments can be examined without access to the Couchbase Server. cbft-bleve-dump parameters
Parameters Description
-dictionary Prints the dictionary for the specified field.
-docID Print all the rows pertaining to the single specified document.
-fields Print the field names and field ids in the index.
-index Specifies Path to the index to dump
-mapping Print a JSON serialization of the index mapping.
If none of these alternate modes have been specified it will dump all rows in the index.
This command line tool only access data via the file system so the user needs appropriate permissions from the host OS.
